00066 PUBLIC void
00067 r_fwd_finalize_nameprefix(struct hashtb_enumerator *e)
00068 {
00069     struct ccnr_handle *h = hashtb_get_param(e->ht, NULL);
00070     struct nameprefix_entry *npe = e->data;
00071     struct propagating_entry *head = &npe->pe_head;
00072     if (head->next != NULL) {
00073         while (head->next != head)
00074             r_match_consume_interest(h, head->next);
00075     }
00076     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&npe->forward_to);
00077     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&npe->tap);
00078     while (npe->forwarding != NULL) {
00079         struct ccn_forwarding *f = npe->forwarding;
00080         npe->forwarding = f->next;
00081         free(f);
00082     }
00083 }
